content: वप् {c1c} <ab>U.</ab> (वपति, वपते, उप्त; {%<ab>pass.</ab>%} उप्यते; {%<ab>desid.</ab>%} विवप्सति-ते) {@--1@} To sow, scatter (as seed), plant; यथेरिणे बीजमुप्त्वा न वप्ता लभते फलं <ls>Ms. 3. 142</ls>; न विद्यामिरिणे वपेत् <ls n="Ms.">2. 113</ls>; यादृशं वपते बीजं तादृशं लभते फलं <ls>Subhāṣ.</ls>; <ls>Ku. 2. 5</ls>; <ls>Ś. 6. 23.</ls> {@--2@} To throw, cast (as dice). {@--3@} To beget, produce. {@--4@} To weave. {@--5@} To shear, shave (mostly Vedic). {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} (वापयति-ते) To sow, plant, put into the ground.
